duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through business to business sales.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, managing multiple touchpoints simultaneously.
Engage in face-to-face networking and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and retention.
Utilize a CRM platform to facilitate client acquisition and maintain business discussions.
Undergo training in publishing and receive support to achieve high sales performance.
Demonstrate strong communication skills and persistence to bring concepts to life and drive sales.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
